Standing Committee of the National People's Congress (abbr. of 全國人民代表大會常務委員會|全国人民代表大会常务委员会)
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 Chang2 Wei3 hui4

definition: National People's Congress (NPC)
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 hui4 yi4

sentences.english: They returned the kindness to Chairman Li and the National People's Congress of China.
sentences.chinese: 他们也向李委员长和中国全国人大转达了问候。

sentences.english: The special committees of the NPC also conduct various types of examinations of law enforcement work.
sentences.chinese: 全国人大各专门委员会也开展形式多样的执法检查。

sentences.english: The Portuguese parliament has maintained good contacts and exchanges with the National People's Congress of China and the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, Gama said.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄牙议会同中国全国人大和政协有着很好的交往。

sentences.english: A delegation of the NPC foreign affairs committee would visit Macedonia sometime this year.
sentences.chinese: 中国全国人大外委会代表团也将于今年访马。

sentences.english: After 5 years, new the arena that countrywide National People's Congress entered the history in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 五年后，新一届的全国人大在北京登上了历史的舞台。

sentences.english: His 'Loquats' was stored in the general office of National People's Congress.
sentences.chinese: 全国人大办公厅收藏《枇杷图》一幅。

sentences.english: The former Vice Chairman of National People's Congress-Jiang Zhenghua held a cordial conversation with the Chairman-Zheng Yuanbao.
sentences.chinese: 原全国人大副委员长蒋正华与郑元豹董事长亲切交谈。
